titleStmt.title: The life of Donna Olimpia Maldachini who governed the church during the time of Innocent the X, which was from the year 1644 to the year 1655 / written in Italian by Abbot Gualdi ; and faithfully rendred into English.
Vita di Donna Olimpia Maidalchini Pamfili. English
titleStmt.author: Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.G. and are to be sold by Robert Littlebury...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Vita di Donna Olimpia Maidalchini Pamfilio.
The original Italian was first published, supposedly at Geneva, with imprint: Cosmopoll, Appresso Eugenio Migani, 1666.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
